title: BMC The Alamo Jim Bowie Knife Toy - 15 inch Long Life Size Plastic Costume Prop
features: Color: Silver-Gray Blade and Dark Brown Handle
description: From the BMC Toys AMERICAN HERO COLLECTOR SERIES, the most memorable weapon from the Battle of the Alamo: JIM BOWIE's KNIFE in full scale as a life size toy or costume prop. Made from fairly stiff, very durable, polypropylene plastic with medium detail, this toy knife measures 15 inches long, just like the real thing. BMC Toys was founded by Bill McMaster in 1991 and specializes in producing historically accurate plastic army men figures and playsets in the classic style of the 1950s and 1960s. Packaged on a retail hang card filled with historical facts about James Bowie on the back and recommended for ages 5 and up. Knife has a rounded tip and is not sharp, however adult supervision is still recommended for younger kids. The 2018 release features all new package art and new dark brown handle color. Jim Bowie Toy Knife Size: 15 inches long Color: Silver-Gray Blade and Dark Brown Handle Scale: Life Size Packaging: Retail Hang Card
